title: Executive Assistant
job_overview:
Executive Assistant

Job name: Executive Assistant | 1+ Year Experience & Strong Verbal and Written English

Description: 

We’re a fast-growing economy rental car company built from the ground up with grit, determination and great service and now we're looking for sharp, reliable virtual assistants to help us keep growing.
We need someone who can adapt quickly, juggle different tasks, and thrive in a fast-paced startup environment. If you're detail-oriented, proactive, customer service focused and ready to be part of something exciting, we’d love to have you on board. Let’s build something great together!

Qualifications:

The Ideal candidate has
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills (email, text, and phone)
• Highly organized with strong attention to detail
• Confident in appointment setting and calendar management
• Comfortable managing social media accounts (posting, engaging, scheduling)
• Experience with CRM tools and keeping records up to date
• Tech-savvy and quick to learn new systems
• Able to multitask and adapt to changing priorities in a fast-paced environment
• Self-starter with a proactive mindset and problem-solving attitude
• Prior experience as an executive assistant or in a similar admin role is a plus

Desired Rate: $4 USD per hour after 60 day probation period completed, $3 USD per hour during probation period. Payroll twice monthly.
Benefits: Full Health Insurance to be provided once 60 day probation period completed

Desired location: Philippines

Hours needed: Full-time 

To apply please email the following items. Any incomplete applications will not be considered!

Full Name
Resume
1 Minute or less video briefly introducing yourself and your work history

We are interviewing and hiring ASAP!
